path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Rova Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Token Decimals
findings.description: The decimal of the token is 6 decimals which may cause miscalculation when interacting with contracts assuming it's an 18 decimal token.

findings.title: Ownership Transfer must be a Two-step Processes
findings.description: Contracts are integrated with the standard Openzeppelin ownable contract, however, when the owner mistakenly transfers ownership to an incorrect address, ownership is completely removed from the original owner and cannot be reverted.
